query.mssql:
-- Шаг 1: Расчетные значения (Calculations) WITH Calculations AS ( SELECT c.EDoc, 'Absolute' AS CalcKind, STRING_AGG(CONCAT(p.Name, ' ', FORMAT(c.AbsoluteCalc, 'F2')), '; ') AS CalcList FROM sberdev_SBContr_ContrCalc c JOIN sberdev_SberCon_ProductsAndDev p ON c.ProductCalc = p.Id GROUP BY c.EDoc
UNION ALL
SELECT c.EDoc, 'Percent' AS CalcKind, STRING_AGG(CONCAT(p.Name, ' ', FORMAT(c.InterestCalc, 'F2')), '; ') AS CalcList FROM sberdev_SBContr_ContrCalc c JOIN sberdev_SberCon_ProductsAndDev p ON c.ProductCalc = p.Id GROUP BY c.EDoc ),
-- Шаг 2: Основной запрос (CTE) CTE AS ( SELECT e.Id, e.Discriminator, re2.Name as Author, re1.Name as BusinessUnit, FORMAT(e.Modified, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS Modified, FORMAT(e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS DocDate, cu.Name as Currency, e.RegNumber_Docflow_Sungero AS Number, m.Name AS MVZ_MVP, a.Name AS AccArt,
-- Объединение значений CalcList COALESCE(c.CalcList, ( SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT(p.Name, ' ', FORMAT(sc.TotalAmount_Docflow_Sungero, 'F2')), ', ') FROM Sungero_Content_EDoc sc JOIN sberdev_SBContr_ContractualDoc cd ON cd.EDoc = sc.Id JOIN sberdev_SberCon_ProductsAndDev p ON cd.Product = p.Id WHERE sc.Id = e.Id GROUP BY sc.Id ), ( SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT(p.Name, ' ', FORMAT(sc.TotalAmount_Docflow_Sungero, 'F2')), ', ') FROM Sungero_Content_EDoc sc JOIN sberdev_SBContr_ContractualDo1 cd ON cd.EDoc = sc.Id JOIN sberdev_SberCon_ProductsAndDev p ON cd.Product = p.Id WHERE sc.Id = e.Id GROUP BY sc.Id ) ) AS CalcList,
e.ContrTypeBase2_SBContr_sberdev AS Contrtype, r.Name AS Conterparty, e.IntApprState_Docflow_Sungero as IntApprState, e.LifeCycleState_Docflow_Sungero as LifeCycleState, dk.Name as DocumentKind, e.Name as [Name], e.Subject_Docflow_Sungero as Subject, e.FrameworkBaseS_SBContr_sberdev as Framework, re3.Name as OurSignatory, e.TotalAmount_Docflow_Sungero AS Amount, e.PurchComNumber_SBContr_sberdev as PurchComNumber, e.LeadDocument_Docflow_Sungero as IdLead, e1.Discriminator as DiscriminatorLead, e1.Name as NameLead FROM Sungero_Content_EDoc e LEFT JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc e1 ON e.LeadDocument_Docflow_Sungero = e1.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Docflow_DocumentKind dk on e.DocumentKind_Docflow_Sungero = dk.Id LEFT JOIN sberdev_SberCon_MVZ m ON e.MVZBaseSberDe1_SBContr_sberdev = m.Id OR e.MVPBaseSberDe1_SBContr_sberdev = m.Id LEFT JOIN sberdev_SberCon_AccountingArti a ON e.AccArtExBaseSb_SBContr_sberdev = a.Id or e.AccArtPrBaseSb_SBContr_sberdev = a.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Parties_Counterparty r ON e.Counterparty_Docflow_Sungero = r.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient re1 on e.BusinessUnit_Docflow_Sungero = re1.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient re2 on e.Author = re2.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient re3 on e.OurSignatory_Docflow_Sungero = re3.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Commons_Currency cu on e.ContrCurrency_Docflow_Sungero = cu.Id LEFT JOIN Calculations c ON e.Id = c.EDoc and c.CalcKind = e.CalculationFl2_SBContr_sberdev WHERE (e.Discriminator = 'F37C7E63-B134-4446-9B5B-F8811F6C9666' or e.Discriminator = '265F2C57-6A8A-4A15-833B-CA00E8047FA5') and e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero >= @startDate and e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero <= @endDate )
-- Шаг 3: Финальный запрос SELECT c.Id, c.Discriminator, c.BusinessUnit, c.Author, c.Modified, c.Contrtype, c.MVZ_MVP, c.AccArt, c.DocDate, c.Number, c.DocumentKind, c.Conterparty, c.LifeCycleState, c.IntApprState, c.Amount, c.Currency, c.CalcList, c.[Subject], c.Framework, c.OurSignatory, c.[Name], c.PurchComNumber, c.IdLead, c.NameLead, c.DiscriminatorLead FROM CTE c;
